header.description: Various functionality related to integrating with MaaS360 via Web Services, such as authenticating, upgrading and retrieving app details.

step-type.name: Request Authentication
step-type.description: Sends an HTTP call to a URL for Authentication Token

property-ui.description: The Root WS URL to send the HTTP call. Should look like https://services.fiberlink.com/. Get the URL for your MaaS instance from Fiberlink
property-ui.label: URL

property-ui.description: Billing Identifier - Available after customer enrolls with MaaS360.
property-ui.label: Billing ID

property-ui.description: This should be the application platform id provided during application provisioning.
property-ui.label: Platform ID

property-ui.description: Provided during application provisioning.
property-ui.label: Application ID

property-ui.description: Provided during application provisioning.
property-ui.label: Application Version

property-ui.description: Generated after the application has been provisioned.
property-ui.label: Application Access Key

property-ui.description: For use with basic authentication.
property-ui.label: MAAS Admin Username

property-ui.description: For use with basic authentication.
property-ui.label: MAAS Admin Password

property-ui.description: If a file name is provided, the response body will be written to that file. The file name is relative to the working directory.
property-ui.label: Output File
